00035 void Timer::clear() {
00036   order.clear();
00037   timings.clear();
00038   start = get_time_ns();
00039   last = start;
00040 }

00043 void Timer::fast_forward() { 
00044   last = get_time_ns(); 
00045 }

00047 
00048 void Timer::record(const string& name) {
00049   timing_t now = get_time_ns();
00050   timing_t elapsed = now - last;
00051 
00052   timing_map::iterator i = timings.find(name);
00053   if (i == timings.end()) {
00054     order.push_back(name);  // track insertion order of unique keys
00055   }
00056   timings[name] += elapsed;
00057 
00058   last = now;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 Timer& Timer::operator+=(const Timer& other) {
00063   for (size_t i=0; i < other.order.size(); i++) {
00064     const string& other_name = other.order[i];
00065     if (timings.find(other_name) == timings.end()) {
00066       order.push_back(other_name);
00067     }
00068     timings[other_name] += other[other_name];
00069   }
00070   return *this;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 void Timer::write(std::ostream& out, bool print_total) const {
00075   timing_t now = get_time_ns();
00076   const string total("Total");
00077   size_t max_len = total.length();
00078 
00079   for (size_t i=0; i < order.size(); i++) {
00080     max_len = max(max_len, order[i].length());
00081   }
00082   
00083   const size_t width = max_len + 2;
00084   for (size_t i=0; i < order.size(); i++) {
00085     ostringstream name;
00086     name << order[i] << ":";
00087     out << left << setw(width) << name.str() << (get(order[i]) / 1e9) << endl;
00088   }
00089   
00090   if (print_total) out << left << setw(width) << total << ((now - start) / 1e9) << endl;
00091 }
